RIC 0.99.0
  • Get started
  • Reference

    RIC: RNA interaction capture

    RIC is a package that contains a number of functions to analyse RNA-bound proteins detected in on oligo-DT-mediated RNA capture experiments. The package contains published SILAC data published by Garcia-Moreno et al 2019 processed with MaxQuant and follows the analytical steps described by Perez-Perri et al 2020.

    Install

    Once installed, load the package by writing in the console

    library(RIC)

    Datasets for analysis

    Mass-spectrometry dericed datasets available in RIC are:

    Data Description
    RIC_peptides RIC from HEK293 infected with SINV virus
    WCL_peptides WCL from HEK293 infected with SINV virus

    Additional information

    Please see the vignette for complete workflow description.
